website_summaries.verdict: This model’s featherweight design and comfortable handgrip make it one of the most portable compact bow cases, and the Shadow Takedown is more than capable of protecting your gear on the go.
pros: Easily stows riser, recurve limbs, and additional equipment
Includes 2 limb sleeves for additional protection
cons: The Shadow Takedown’s durable exterior and pockets are great protection, but we wish its foam interior was a little thicker

customer_reviews.title: Decent but sparsely-featured
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because of positive reviews and the external pocket. My SAS case didn't have that feature, and I thought it would be handy. This case is well-made, BUT a) the external pocket isn't big enough to do much, and b) the ABSENCE of internal pockets (a key feature of the SAS case) prompted me to return this one. Perhaps the biggest reason for the return, though, is that I got my wife a RED quiver, so she couldn't believe I didn't get her a RED bow case to match. What was I thinking...
customer_reviews.author: D.Lee

customer_reviews.title: This inside of this case has no pockets
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bow case today. For the money, it is worth it because the case is made of a tough cordura and the zippers are strong enough for normal wear. The case has not pickets but sleeves for the limbs. The case is merely a folded padded case. There is a photo of it on the label but not on any advertisement description. I suppose it would deter from potential sales.
customer_reviews.author: Burbank Jung

customer_reviews.title: Soft sided bow case with plenty of room and an affordable price. Plus I own one so that will make you THAT much cooler in life!
customer_reviews.text: Needed an inexpensive case to store by new take down bow in and I couldn't be happier. For the price, this case easily holds my 66" take down recurve bow, it has sleeves in which to place the bow limbs and is easily roomy enough to also hold my shooting glove, arm guard, the bow string and the stringer that I had purchased. I have an arrow rest attached to my bow and it fits nicely without having to remove from the bow.
customer_reviews.author: Paco14

customer_reviews.title: Simple and It Works
customer_reviews.text: Easy, simple and has everything you need. Good amount of padding, two limb sleeves are not cushioned but works well against scratches. It also has a loop on one side where you can hang this bad in a closet or so. Very simple to operate, liking it better than my roll-up cases.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: A good basic bow case.
customer_reviews.text: A good basic case for a good price. The outer accessory pocket is small - a larger bellows pocket would be a good change for the next improved model. No frills, should do the job adequately.
customer_reviews.author: NRevellTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bag is nice quality. It did not work for our needs at all. Can not return it as my daughter lost all the packaging for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy N.

customer_reviews.title: No limb sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Decent case but no limb sleeves and no acceptable solution
customer_reviews.author: KG5PEL

customer_reviews.title: Great case if you only put in a bow and few accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great case but since I've gotten my bow sight the case bulges a bit. Really works great for holding just a bow!
customer_reviews.author: G-Xop

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for my takedown bow and all additional supplies.
customer_reviews.author: 301Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Pocket ripped
customer_reviews.text: Its ok pocket ripped down the side after one use
customer_reviews.author: john law

customer_reviews.title: What a  Great product at a great price !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product for the price could not be happier. It is very well-made. Works great for my takedown recurve bow.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Zewe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: using this now to pack in my recurve riser and limbs etc. works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: HARRY VANSOOLEN

customer_reviews.title: No sleeve for riser
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft case with sleeves for limbs, too bad a riser sleeve was not included.
customer_reviews.author: DKT

product_meta.title: 30-06 Shadow Takedown Recurve Bow Case Black
product_meta.description: Soft bow case for Takedown Recurve bows. Features heavy duty construction with external storage pocket and limb protectors. Dimensions: 32"x10".
